summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Rituel de Fille - Natural Ash + Ember Eye Soot (Seven Sisters)
Review Date: 2015/12/07
Store: Rituel de Fille
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 2 x 2 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '632709440162'}
Review Text: The description is completely accurate!  I love this product because it goes on sooo smooth and last all day.  The color is AMAZING and goes with everything and every eye color! I LOVE that this product doesn't contain any harsh dyes or chemicals/fragrances so I can feel good about what I'm putting on my skin! I have sensitive eyes when it comes to makeup too and this does not irritate my eyes at all.  I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who wants BEAUTIFUL eyes!
Review Title: Best eyeshadow ever!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Mukti Organics - Organic Balancing Foaming Cleanser
Review Date: 2015/12/07
Store: MUKTI
Average Rating: 5.0
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'Oily', 'Brand': 'MUKTI', 'Scent': 'Flame Tree', 'Material Feature': 'Organic', 'Package Dimensions': '7.9 x 2.8 x 2.7 inches; 15.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '632709438893'}
Review Text: Mukti is an amazing company and makes great products like this cleanser! This makes my skin look and feel heathy!  I love that they use only good organic ingredients!  It's hard to find products that actually work, but this one is awesome!  I love everything that they make!
Review Title: Love it!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Apoterra - Organic Night Regenerative Balm with Prickly Pear + Vitamin C
Review Date: 2016/02/16
Store: Supportiback
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Supportiback', 'Item Form': 'Balm', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Benefits': 'Anti-Aging', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 1.9 x 1.2 inches; 1.05 Pounds', 'UPC': '632709439708', 'Manufacturer': 'Supportiback'}
Review Text: This balm is AMAZING! I use it every night and still have barely made a dent in it, so a little goes a long way! It smells great, deeply hydrates my skin, and makes my skin look and feel healthy.  One of my favorite things about Apoterra is that they don’t use any harsh chemicals in their products.  Their Activated Charcoal & Dead Sea Salt Complexion Soap is wonderful as well!
Review Title: AMAZING!!! A little goes a long way:)
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Graydon Skincare - All Natural Face Glow Cream (1 fl oz / 30 ml)
Review Date: 2016/04/14
Store: Graydon Skincare
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Graydon Skincare', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '5.6 x 1.8 x 1.7 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '632709437322'}
Review Text: A must have in your makeup bag because of its amazing versatility! Not only does it protect your skin, but it actually enriches it, serves as a sunblock AND a makeup primer! A little goes a long way.  And the best part is that its actually GOOD for your skin, containing NO harsh chemicals!  Yes, please!!!
Review Title: AMAZINGLY luxurious:)
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual demonstrates a strong preference for organic and natural skincare and makeup products, consistently rating most items highly due to their effectiveness and gentle formulations suitable for sensitive skin. Key themes include a focus on products that are chemical-free, with particular appreciation for those featuring beneficial ingredients like vitamins and plant extracts. The consistent mention of product durability indicates a preference for high-quality items that provide good value, as products that perform well and last long receive favorable reviews. 

Price sensitivity is not overtly apparent as the person favors quality over cost, often expressing loyalty to brands that prioritize organic ingredients. The individual values versatility in their purchases, often selecting products which can be used for multiple purposes, further emphasizing practicality in their choices. Overall, the core preferences encapsulate a commitment to health-conscious beauty, favoring brands that align with a holistic lifestyle while ensuring that products are both effective and kind to the skin.

target_interaction.title: 100% approved! Love it:)
target_interaction.text: Looking for an excellent exfoliant? Look no further! Mukti makes the most amazing facial products, like this one! It does everything the description claims and they don't add any harsh ingredients, so you can feel good about applying this to your face! Look up their other products and give them a try, you won't be disappointed!
target_interaction.title_meta: Mukti Organics - Organic / Vegan 2-IN-1 Resurfacing Exfoliant (3.5 fl oz / 100 ml)
